title: Sustainable Logistics: Navigating the Path of a Green Supply Chain - Supply and Demand Chain Executive
summary: The article discusses the growing trend of "Green Supply Chains" in the business world. Companies are increasingly focused on minimizing their environmental impact through various methods, including incorporating electric vehicles into their fleets, adopting circular economy principles, and utilizing data to track and reduce emissions. The article highlights the benefits of this approach, including cost savings, improved brand reputation, and increased operational efficiency, while acknowledging the challenges involved in transitioning to a more sustainable model.
